dct_description_sm: Latitudinal and longitudinal lines [inset map only].
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
3 bar scales on map given in "Leucae", "Mille passus", and "Mill. ger."
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
22 pictorial vignettes surrounding map: [Depictions of Abraham's life and travels].
Includes a decorative cartouche with a dedication to "Johannes Moflinio".
Descriptive text at top and bottom margins: Abraham egredere der terra tua...
Appears in Ortelius's Theatrum orbis terrarum. 1595.
